source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Drawing Backgrounds and Learning Perspective

visible_instructors.name: Ed
visible_instructors.job_title: Illustrator and Instructor at How To Draw Comics . net
visible_instructors.title: Ed Foychuk

items.headline: A simplified approach
objectives_summary: Learn how to draw in perspective
Learn the various approaches to drawing perspective
Learn what goes into an effective background in a drawing

items.title: Portraiture In Oil

visible_instructors.name: Juan
visible_instructors.job_title: Artist and Art Instructor: Traditional Drawing & Painting
visible_instructors.title: Juan Martinez

items.headline: Portraiture In Oil - The Modern Fundamentals of Traditional Drawing and Painting
objectives_summary: Portrait Painting
Oil Painting
How to paint skin tone

items.title: Drawing the Human Figure
items.headline: Learn various drawing techniques and skills to become an amazing Figure Drawing artist today!
objectives_summary: draw the human figure with multiple techniques
identify the horizon line in a scene or location
understand the power of light

items.title: Impressionism - Paint this Venice painting in oil or acrylic
items.headline: Learn Impressionism techniques by creating this Venice painting. For total beginner through advanced painters.
objectives_summary: Create an entire painting in one sitting
Learn about Impressionism and why it is so powerful
Understand how light works to make things look the way they do, and how to translate that into your paintings

items.title: Needle Felting Essentials

visible_instructors.name: Yelena
visible_instructors.job_title: Needle felting artist & doll maker from Toronto, Canada.
visible_instructors.title: Yelena Poghosyan

items.headline: A complete course to learn dry needle felting - make friends with fibers
objectives_summary: Create toys and sculptures from wool
Use multiple needle felting techniques with confidence
Know about the right tools and materials - SAVE TIME & MONEY!

items.title: How To Teach Craft Workshops
items.headline: A step-by-step guide to designing, teaching and promoting creative courses - create a business from your art skills
objectives_summary: Topic planning - decide exactly what to teach and in what format
Teach craft workshops to students with ease
Understand the best ways to structure a creative course

items.title: Impressionism - Paint this figure painting in oil or acrylic
items.headline: Learn Impressionism techniques by creating this figure painting. For total beginner through advanced painters.
objectives_summary: Create an entire painting in one sitting
Learn about Impressionism and why it is so powerful
Understand how light works to make things look the way they do, and how to translate that into your paintings

items.title: Fountain Pen Ink Art - The Basics
items.headline: Learn how to use fountain pen inks and bleach for watercolour painting, illustration and calligraphy
objectives_summary: You will learn how to use fountain pen inks as an art medium
You will learn how to investigate an ink, explore it’s chromatography, the impact of serendipity and how it reacts with bleach.
You will learn how to swatch test fountain pen inks and create beautiful swatch cards

items.title: Floral Design -- Not Just Flower Arranging

visible_instructors.name: Sandy
visible_instructors.job_title: Computer Skill Developer & Professional Floral Designer
visible_instructors.title: Sandy McVey

items.headline: Flowers from the market, garden, and supply houses become memorable gifts for friends or profit.
objectives_summary: Learn floral design basics: balance, scale, color, combination elements
Know how to prepare your arrangements for maximum freshness
Understand the importance of visual and physical balance

items.title: Mastering the Art of Macramé
items.headline: The Ultimate Guide To Macramé Projects & Design | Get Loose & Unwind with Macramé
objectives_summary: Mastering the Art of Macramé
Fibre Tying and knotting Techniques
How to Knot, Design Patterns, and Creating Your Own Macramé Pieces

items.title: WireWrapping Jewelry Making GutsyGuide: Mastering the Basics

visible_instructors.name: Heather
visible_instructors.job_title: Artist, Designer and Owner at GutsyGirl Designs
visible_instructors.title: Heather Rivera, M.Ed.

items.headline: Everything you need to begin creating your own beautiful wire wrapped jewelry
objectives_summary: Demonstrate proficiency in all the wire wrapping basics, including tools, terminology, methods and techniques
Construct basic wire wrapped components that serve as the structure of entire projects
Combine and connect wire wrapped components to create complete jewelry projects including earrings, necklaces, bracelets and rings.

items.title: The Colored Pencils Drawing Masterclass: Draw Amazing Art

visible_instructors.name: Chad
visible_instructors.job_title: Professor / Graphic Designer / Photographer 20+ yrs exp.
visible_instructors.title: Chad Neuman, Ph.D.

visible_instructors.name: Jonathan
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Illustrator, Professor 28+ yrs exp.
visible_instructors.title: Jonathan Simon, BFA, MFA

items.headline: Draw a landscape, animal, still life, character design, portrait, and more while learning art, concepts, and techniques.
objectives_summary: Draw a water droplet and globe with realistic depth, form, light, and shadow.
Draw a colorful still life of tomatoes.
Draw a colorful frog using colored pencils and various blending methods.

items.title: Learn how to draw step by step. Art and Creativity.

visible_instructors.name: Antonio
visible_instructors.job_title: Profesor Doctor por la Universidad de Bellas Artes, Sevilla
visible_instructors.title: Antonio García Villarán

items.headline: Learn how to draw by observing, perceiving, representing shape and creating in a fun and simple way. Art and Creativity.
objectives_summary: You will be able to draw everything you see
You will acquire freedom and conviction while drawing
You will be able to fit shapes correctly in a format

items.title: How to Add Light to Your Landscape Painting
items.headline: A Detailed Lesson into Color and Light Effects in Landscape Painting
objectives_summary: Paint a landscape scene with confidence.
Have a practical understanding of color in paintings.
Confidently assess color and values in a subject.

items.title: Digital Painting in Clip Studio Paint - Character Design
items.headline: From Concept to Finished Painting
objectives_summary: Draw and paint character designs with more confidence.
Use Manga Studio 5 / Clip Studio Paint effectively.
Digitally paint a variety of materials.

items.title: Aromatherapy Candle Making

visible_instructors.name: Álysson
visible_instructors.job_title: Mestre em Aromaterapia Thai Massagem e Terapias Energéticas
visible_instructors.title: Álysson Correia

items.headline: Make Therapeutic Candles for Health and Wellbeing
objectives_summary: You will learn how to make 100% eco friendly, all natural Therapeutic Candles.
You will learn all the basics an Candle Making like, wax and wick selection and Burn Tests.
Even if you're not an expert in Aromatherapy, this course will provide you with reliable straight forward knowledge to start making therapeutic candles
